amendment.description: To provide for youth jobs, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2177, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 243.

action.text: Amendment SA 2177 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104, S5112-5114) To provide for youth jobs, and for other purposes.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2177, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 243.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2177, under the order of 7/15/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 243.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2177 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 2089.
